author: Brooklynbornfloridia
title: Beautiful experience, large rooms for Manhattan, free full breakfast great! Staff was extremely nice all was great
text:
Love
Everything ❤️ Location was the best mins from everything or a quick cab ride... The view was fantastic so close to the Empire State Building, was able to watch the colors change felt like I could reach out and touch it....
